duties_responsibilities.duty: Guide a small team of combustion device experts through the early stages of the Neutron program.
Serve as technical expert for combustion devices in engine design discussions.
Own critical combustion designs, analysis, and other technical details to support team objectives.
Provide strategy on development plans and collaborate with manufacturing teams to ensure producibility.
Support engine and sub-system testing remotely and onsite as needed at test facilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering, aerospace engineering or related field (Master’s or PhD preferred).
